basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Darshit Shyani. I am a passionate and dedicated Frontend Developer with 3 years of professional experience in designing and developing user-friendly, responsive, and visually appealing web applications. My expertise includes working with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React.js and Next.js.

projects.title: Animal Food Shop
projects.description: In this project, my role as a Frontend Developer involved designing and implementing user-friendly interfaces to ensure a seamless user experience. I handled the frontend logic, including state management, API integration, and dynamic rendering of components. My focus was on optimizing performance and maintaining responsive, visually appealing layouts across all devices.

projects.title: Hotel Booking Site
projects.description: In this project, as a Frontend Developer, I utilized React, Tailwind CSS, React-Hook-Form, and Redux to build a dynamic and responsive user interface. My responsibilities included implementing frontend logic, managing state efficiently with Redux, and ensuring seamless form handling with React-Hook-Form. I focused on delivering a visually appealing, performant, and user-friendly experience.

projects.title: VIZU admin-panel
projects.description: The application leverages a powerful and modern technology stack, including Next.js, TypeScript, Material-UI, Tailwind CSS, Supabase, Redux Toolkit (Redux-Slice), Context API, and custom hooks.The Vizu Admin Panel is a powerful management tool designed to streamline administrative tasks and efficiently manage various aspects of an application. Built with Supabase for secure authentication, it ensures a safe environment for administrative operations. The panel enables administrators to seamlessly create, update, and delete categories and fields, simplifying application management.
